ques: 7. Miss A had a friendly relation with Mr. B. Both are in their teen-age. They developed a bond and trust and have had consensual sex. But one day, the boy sent their private images to her friends. Since then the girl feels shattered and depressed. She feels suddenly loss of reputation and betrayal. To her shock, the boy denied any involvement. The girl doesn’t want a police case rather she wants acknowledgement of wrongdoing and admission of guilt by the boy.
